thread.title: Parkmobile, LLC announces the appointment of Jon Ziglar as Chief Executive Officer
thread.title_full: Parkmobile, LLC announces the appointment of Jon Ziglar as Chief Executive Officer - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Parkmobile, LLC announces the appointment of Jon Ziglar as Chief Executive Officer
text:
Parkmobile, LLC
ATLANTA , Aug. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Parkmobile, LLC ("Parkmobile"), the leading provider for on-demand and pre-paid mobile payments, including bookings and reservations for on- and off-street parking announced today the appointment of Jon Ziglar as Chief Executive Officer. Mr. Ziglar is replacing Cherie Fuzzell , who is leaving the company to pursue other opportunities.
Jon has an extensive track record of driving growth and innovation in technology and technology-enabled service businesses. Prior to Parkmobile, Ziglar served as Managing Director, International, for Ceridian HCM, a global provider of human capital management software and services. While at Ceridian, he additionally served as Chief Strategy Officer and Chief Product and Innovation Officer. Prior to Ceridian, Jon served as Sr. Vice President, Strategic Planning and Enterprise Development at Elavon, a leading global payments technology company, and held executive positions in a number of bay area technology and software companies. Jon started his career in investment banking, covering the business services, technology, and consumer products industries.
"I am extremely excited to join the Parkmobile team," stated Mr. Ziglar. "As a leader in the industry, Parkmobile is ideally positioned to take advantage of the rapid growth and innovation occurring in the space. The Parkmobile solutions are fundamentally transforming the way we access and procure services for our personal vehicles and other modes of transportation. Moreover," he added, "the Parkmobile suite of services enables businesses and municipalities to optimize the value of their inventory, driving increased revenue and greater cost management."
Ralph Booth , Chairman of Parkmobile, LLC said, "We are very excited to have Jon join the Parkmobile team. He brings tremendous technical, operational, and managerial experience to the company with a proven track record of driving growth and scale through market leading, customer focused solutions, both in the US and globally. His experience in building through acquisition and strategic alliances will be invaluable as consolidation opportunities within the sector are advancing. Under his leadership, Parkmobile gains new momentum to increase its global footprint while expanding the breadth of its offerings to increase value to both consumers and business partners." Mr. Booth added, "We are grateful to Cherie for her leadership in bringing Parkmobile to its current position in the industry and look forward to an exciting new chapter for the business."
For additional information and locations, please visit: www.parkmobile.com or www.park-now.com
About Parkmobile
Parkmobile, LLC is the leading provider for on-demand and prepaid mobile payments, including bookings and reservations for on- and off-street parking. Their services are used in more than 1,400 locations in the U.S. by millions of registered users. For more information please visit www.parkmobile.com , facebook.com/Parkmobile or on Twitter @Parkmobile.
